summary: Valentin Broeksmit tried to exploit crypto vulnerabilities to squeeze money out of thin air. The catch is, he couldnâ€™t cash out.
title: A Crypto Alchemist Made Me an Accidental Billionaire
detailed_content: FEW THINGS CAN turn around a boring winter afternoon like receiving a billion dollars. The amount is there, in its 10-figure glory, glaring from my phone screen in white characters against a charcoal background: $1,112,172,834.
author: BY GIAN M. VOLPICELLI
